spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hamadryad's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The hamadryad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
entries: The hamadryad can communicate with Beasts and Plants as if they shared a language.

trait.name: Tree Stride
entries: Once on her turn, the hamadryad can use 10 ft. of her Movement to step magically into one living tree within her reach and emerge from a second living tree within 60 ft. of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 ft. of the second tree. Both trees must be Large in size (or bigger).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hamadryad makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@dice 1d4 + 3}) plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage.
